definition: to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: The sword falls, eastern brocade in the mind immediately a cold.
sentences.chinese: 剑落，东方锦心里顿时一寒。

sentences.english: The din in the factory ends abruptly when the noon whistle sounds.
sentences.chinese: 当中午的笛声响起时，工厂里的嘈杂声顿时停止了。

sentences.english: Hearing what Xu You said, he suddenly felt embarrassed and at a loss.
sentences.chinese: 意而子听许由这么说，顿时觉得尴尬而不知所措。

sentences.english: Dozens of Spanish beauties clamoured to get close to their idol.
sentences.chinese: 无数的西班牙美女顿时尖叫，拥过去接近她们的偶像。

sentences.english: Suddenly all the tension seemed to leave my body as the truth of what he said hit me.
sentences.chinese: 找领悟了他话中的道理，浑身的紧张顿时消失了。

sentences.english: I gazed awhile, and felt as light, and free.
sentences.chinese: 片刻凝眸间，我顿时觉得轻盈自在。

sentences.english: Wheat and blade immediately big shout a voice to summon YuFen flapping up.
sentences.chinese: 麦子与刀锋顿时大呼一声扑上去前去召唤玉芬。

sentences.english: Suddenly, loses inspiration, makes me flurried and be at loss.
sentences.chinese: 顿时失去了灵感，慌张而不知所措。

sentences.english: The Ling Ling brings the green wooden clansman to disperse immediately and enter into the city.
sentences.chinese: 林林带众绿色木族人顿时分散开来，投入城内。

sentences.english: Each saw the plate melon, I immediately opened the appetite.
sentences.chinese: 每一看到那盘瓜，我顿时食欲大开。

sentences.english: A broad open space was cleared in the middle of the garret.
sentences.chinese: 破屋子的中间顿时空了一大片。

sentences.english: the boa constrictor, when he has had an adequate meal , goes to sleep, and does not wake until he needs another meal.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟒饱餐一顿后就睡觉，直到需要再吃一顿时才醒来。

sentences.english: Noda's the second highest number of votes immediately attracted the audience breathless.
sentences.chinese: 野田的这一第二高得票数顿时引来台下的惊叹声。

sentences.english: All the old hatred for their former enemy flared up.
sentences.chinese: 对他们过去敌人的一切旧恨宿怨顿时涌上心头。

sentences.english: The room lights up when she walks in.
sentences.chinese: 她一走进来，屋子顿时增辉不少。

sentences.english: I couldn't help thinking of his parents at the sight of the orphan.
sentences.chinese: 一看到阿谁孤女，我便没有由自顿时念起了他的怙恃。

definition: in a short while/all at once/all of a sudden
in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
